page.title: 05Housing in Yeovil.
page.content: The figures given for{Council {Housing}cover the South Somerset District Council area.There are 8375 council houses for families,3801 bungalows & flats for handicapped, elderly & single people, & 1809 are waiting for council accommodation.Last year 159 properties were built & 73 more planned.There are few sub- standard properties. There is a wide variety of{private properties,ranging from large detached houses in spacious surroundings,to small bungalows & terraced houses.The greatest proportion is semi-detached, of brick with tiled roofs.Bungalows are particularly in demand. {House prices}are below the national average,(an older semi costs about Â£32,000).New houses on the estates cost up to Â£40,000+.Little rented accommmodation is available.
